title: Make nn.ModuleList behave like an actual list
body_html:
Slices are not working.

import torch.nn as nn

s = nn.ModuleList(modules=[nn.Linear(10, 10),
                           nn.Linear(10, 10),
                           nn.Linear(10, 10)])
print(s[:1])

TypeError: '<=' not supported between instances of 'int' and 'slice'

It doesn't look like a very time-consuming issue, I can get on it next weekend.

body:
Slices are not working.

```
import torch.nn as nn

s = nn.ModuleList(modules=[nn.Linear(10, 10),
                           nn.Linear(10, 10),
                           nn.Linear(10, 10)])
print(s[:1])

TypeError: '<=' not supported between instances of 'int' and 'slice'
```

It doesn't look like a very time-consuming issue, I can get on it next weekend.
